amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report evaluating the implementation by the Department of Veterans Affairs of section 101 of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2775 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2775 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7878-7881; text: CR S7879) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report evaluating the implementation by the Department of Veterans Affairs of section 101 of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2775 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2775 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2763.
